text: Wow, she seemed like quite a character.

It was our first meeting, right? And suddenly,
"Teach me how to get better!"—she's pretty bold.

─So, what was the reason behind it?
The desire to improve...

Yeah, she said it was because
she wanted to impress someone she liked.
I think she asked me a few other things too...

Like for romantic song recommendations
and stuff...
She asked if I had any recommended songs.

At that moment, I was just taken aback...
and couldn't really give a good answer.

But looking back on it now,
I thought it was amazing how she could act like that.
But I'm not sure this is the same as romantic advice.

She wasn't exactly a friend, and she may not be very helpful
in expressing or interpreting the new song...

It's like, just like she did back then,
expressing the feeling of love...

I think we have to express ourselves
through songs and performances.

Also... we need to make sure we convey
the feeling that we're having fun.
